resources.string: Famous for extravagant Buddhist structure and holy school of Tibetan religion,\n Buddha Temple is the most visited place in Dehradun city.\n Located at Clement Town, Buddha Temple is center of attraction for many International tourists and Budhhist followers.

Tapkeshwar is a famous holy temple of Lord Shiva on the bank of seasonal Asan river near Dehradun.\n Known to have one of the oldest Shivling in the cave, Tapkeshwar Mahadev Temple is located at 6.5 km from Dehradun city. \n As water droplets continuously drops on the shivling, hence it was named as Tapkeshwar.

Sahastradhara literally means thousand-fold spring.
 It is a popular attraction, famous for its ecstatic beauty and therapeutic value since its water contains Sulphur. 
While the place can be visited any time during the year, you would love the charming beauty of the waterfall during the rainy season when the stream proposes the appearance of a gushing torrent. 
 Sahastradhara is one of the most popular tourist destinations in Uttarakhand

The Forest Research Institute (FRI) वन अनुसन्धान संस्थान is an institute of the Indian Council of Forestry Research and Education and is a premier institution in the field of forestry research in India.\n It is located at Dehradun in Uttarakhand, and is one of the oldest institutions of its kind.\n In 1991, it was declared a deemed university by the University Grants Commission.

Paltan Bazar is renowned for being the hub of basmati rice, which is also the city’s pride.\n People come here to buy basmati rice in bulk. Besides, this shopping paradise also sells clothes, shoes and bags. Shoppers can also pick various kinds of spices here along with several other food items.\n The market remains open every day of the week and is a must visit in Dehradun.

Pacific Mall is redefining the paradigm of shopping experience in the city. \n With some of the most aspired lifestyle brands, a massive food-court – Salt, offering delectable range of cuisines, five screen PVR multiplex, expansive play zone and so much more, the mall urges its patrons to make more time for happiness.
A beautiful and resonable option for all shopaholics.
A perfect place for a family gathering offering Indian ,Chinese and Italian Cuisine
Café de Piccolo offers everything from excellent Italian food, great coffee to amazing view and one of its kind décor.
An idiosyncratic place to dine and wine, Mirabilia located in the midst of the sultry Doon Valley will make your dining experience fanatical.
Pioneers of Live Grill Concept in India. A place known for any celebrations.\n Best Barbecues/kebabs and Starters. Unlimited Food including Starters, Main Course, Desserts, Kulfi.
Your onestop for the latest and vintage books and a chance to meet Mr.Ruskin Bond
Awaken the Warrior in you and win the arena to be declared king.
Beautiful and bursting with colors ,this place is adream come true for every art lover.
